info.name: StormShelters
info.description:
## API

This API will return endpoints to GET all instances of a model and to GET a specific instance of a model.

request.description:
Gets the City page with the following information:

- Population
- Temperature (F)
    
- Wind Speed (mph)
    
- Weather Condition
    
- Precipitation (in)

request.description: Return the city corresponding to the id

Gets the shelter page with the following information:

- Name
    
- Open/Closed
    
- URL
    
- Rating
    
- City
    
- Address
    
- Phone

- Address
